channel.title: Halo Sword First Model
channel.description:
Hello guys this is my first model so please dont hate me for trying!
1.Tell me how i can improve. 2.Don't flame me or hate me 3.Can somebody help me abit VIA msn send me ur msn thought Private message or post here
This took me around 1hr.. i'm a newbie lol :D
[img]http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/6453/modely.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/8282/model2b.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/7180/model3k.jpg[/img]
If you want some more picture please ask :D

item.title: Halo Sword First Model
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Very very very flat. Last time I checked halo energy sword was sharp and not flat. Move those vertices around to make it 3d please.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo Sword First Model
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

Yes you obv got the fact it was my first model… also im going to use primitive

Read full topic

item.title: Halo Sword First Model
item.dc:creator: @Timberpig1 Timberpig.
item.description:
@Timberpig1 wrote:

[quote=“DraculeMihawk, post:6, topic:359378”][quote author=tubefish link=topic=455844.msg3337530#msg3337530 date=1284072107]
ok all you did was either lifted it or you extruded it AFTER tracing it

try using a primitive and then shaping it into the halo sword
[/quote]

Thats what people do when they extrude…

Model looks flat make it more round also.[/quote]

hahahahahahahahaha omg nooooooo waaaaaaaaaaaaaay!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Halo Sword First Model
item.dc:creator: @DraculeMihawk DraculeMihawk
item.description:
@DraculeMihawk wrote:

[quote=“tubefish, post:5, topic:359378”]ok all you did was either lifted it or you extruded it AFTER tracing it

try using a primitive and then shaping it into the halo sword[/quote]

Thats what people do when they extrude…

Model looks flat make it more round also.

item.title: Halo Sword First Model
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

All this is is a trace. Use a primitive cube and extrude the faces to make this with a cleaner look. If you have no idea what the fuck I’m saying, just try primitives to make a basic sword.

Read full topic
